Name: Voodoo
Ingredients: 60 ml Caribbean blended rum aged 6-10 years
7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Collins glass .
Prepare garnish of dust with cinnamon powder (sprinkled through flame).
Review: The rich flavour of the aged rum marries well with vermouth and apple, freshened by lime.
History: Created in 2002 by Alex Kammerling, London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Voodoo contains 258 calories
